title: Sara's Loss
description: Caroline Thornton is a pianist extraordinaire. Having grown up unaware that she has a sister, she arrives in Sheriton nervous and wary.Her fianc√© was a lying, cheating SOB, and when Caroline arrives in Sheriton she decides that she will take charge of her relationships - from now on she will decide who and when and where and how.But she hasn't bargained for Travis Lovette, owner of The Lovette Hotel where Caroline becomes a guest. He hides himself away from his staff and the rest of the world, and he despises Caroline.Can she untangle the many mysteries surrounding her family's scattering to the four winds, and can she win the heart and mind of the enigma that is Travis Lovette.
author: Susan Elle
